summary: Tested Silent Disco features: 1) UI Mobile LIVE button positioning (top-left, not overlapping Mute button), 2) Coach Dashboard responsive layout for delete buttons, 3) WebSocket /api/ws/session/{id} functionality. All tests passed.

issues: YouTube video shows 'Video unavailable' - known issue from previous iterations, not related to current features

passed_tests: LIVE button positioned at top-left (12px, 12px) relative to video container on mobile (375px)
LIVE button positioned at bottom-center on desktop (1920px)
LIVE button and Mute button do NOT overlap on mobile
LIVE button fits within 320px screen width
No horizontal overflow at 320px or 375px viewport
WebSocket JOIN message returns STATE_SYNC response
WebSocket Coach can send PLAY/PAUSE commands
critical_code_review_comments: CSS .live-btn-container correctly uses @media (max-width: 639px) for mobile positioning
Mobile: top: 12px, left: 12px positions LIVE button in top-left corner
Desktop: bottom: 16px, left: 50%, transform: translateX(-50%) centers button at bottom
Coach Dashboard uses flex-col xs:flex-row for responsive layout
Delete button uses self-end xs:self-center for proper alignment
WebSocket endpoint /api/ws/session/{session_id} properly handles JOIN, PLAY, PAUSE, SEEK, TRACK_CHANGE commands
SilentDiscoManager class manages connections, session states, and coach commands

test_credentials.coach_access: Via 'Connexion Coach' link in footer or triple-click on copyright

seed_data_creation: WebSocket test sessions created and cleaned up automatically
context_for_next_testing_agent: Silent Disco features verified: 1) LIVE button CSS positioning works correctly on mobile (top-left) and desktop (bottom-center). 2) WebSocket /api/ws/session/{id} functional for real-time audio sync. 3) Coach Dashboard delete buttons responsive on small screens. Note: Coach Dashboard requires Google OAuth - cannot be fully tested via Playwright without real Google login.
